name: Too Heartbroken to Fight Basement Rats
name_original: Too Heartbroken to Fight Basement Rats
description:
Made for the Fresh Start Game Jam [Game takes about 15 minutes or less to beat]

It's the oldest quest in the book, with one major obstacle.

You promised to fight the rats in the basement of the inn.

But you've recently had your heartbroken, and have no energy left.

See if you can cobble together enough MP to cast your spells and save the day.
